key_talking_points: Florida's Sam Bennett and Anton Lundell registered shots on goal within a few seconds of each other, putting pressure on Edmonton goalie Stuart Skinner.
Sam Bennett then took a tripping penalty at 3:32, sending Edmonton to the power play. Can the Oilers capitalize and tie the game?
Ryan Nugent-Hopkins won the ensuing faceoff after the penalty for Edmonton. Followed by a missed shot.
The score is currently 5-4 for Florida with 16:07 remaining in the first period. Edmonton has a chance to even the score on the power play.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game has medium momentum due to the shots on goal and subsequent penalty. Focus on the power play opportunity for Edmonton.

high_intensity_events.summary: Sam Bennett (FLA) shot on goal at 03:26
Anton Lundell (FLA) shot on goal at 03:29

task_details.specific_guidance: Highlight the impact of the upcoming power play for Edmonton and Sam Bennett's penalty.
